DISTANCE is generally accurate but ELEVATION GAIN is not. Values are calculated from the GPX file without any filtering(DEMs).

1

This slider exaggerates the elevation profile to make it easier to see changes.

Upload GPX

[ Dev Notes ]
  • The viewer has not been optimized. In general, the larger the GPX file (i.e. more data points), the lower the FPS.
  • It's currently not well optimized for mobile or tablet devices. Will work on that.
  • If you notice a black screen or frozen UI, just wait a bit. Large GPX files take a while to load.
